revision.text: Some Berries require mutation or planting Berries according to specific conditions to be unlocked. The [[Berry Master]] NPC found at Cerulean City in [[Kanto]] provides hints on how to trigger mutations. Any Berry can Mutate when all of the needed Berries are at the Taller Stage. Certain mutations depend on flavor profiles, specific types of berries, or other factors, some of which are outside of the Farm.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
